subject: FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGAT
body:
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
  UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE
  WASHINGTON, D.C. 20535
 We the High Commission received a report of fraudulent acts
  against you and in a meeting held with
  the Government and the world high commissions against fraudulent
  activities by Citizens, Your are among those scammed, as listed by the
  Financial Intelligent Unit (NFIU). A re-compensation has been issued
  out in the form of an ATM DEBIT CARD of $2,316,000USD (Two Million,
  Three Hundred and Sixteen thousand United States dollars)  and has
  already been in distribution to you as a Victim.
  Your ATM CARD was among those that was reported undelivered as we wish
  to advise you to follow the instructions of the Committee to make sure
  you receive your ATM CARD immediately for your usage. NFIU further
  told us that the use of the Couriers  was abolished due to
  interception activities noticed in the above mentioned courier
  services in which the Financial Intelligent Unit have made a concrete
  arrangement with the Courier Company for a safe delivery to your
  door-step once the beneficiary meets up the demand of the conveyance.
  We advise that you do the needful to make sure they dispatch your
  recompense on time. You are assured of the safety of your ATM CARD
  availability,also be advised that you should stop further contacts
  with all the fake lawyers and security companies who in collaboration
  have a scam deal with you immediately to check if the delivery date
  suits you.
  You have to stop all contact with any other company emailing you
  online concerning Money, and make sure you forward to them all thier
  email and mobile numbers and you will contact Mr. David Beardsley for
  your ATM DEBIT CARD through his email:(
americadeliverycomapny1500@gmail.com
)
 Let us know immediately you receive it there.
Yours truly,
 MR CHRISTOPHER A WRAY
    DIRECTOR
  FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
  UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE
  WASHINGTON, D.C. 20535

subject: Re:   FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGAT
body:
Hello MR WRAY,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I had no idea that I was involved in such a situation. 

Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in your investigation? And what exactly does it mean that an ATM DEBIT CARD has been issued to me?

I'm also curious about the process moving forward. What do I need to do next? You mentioned something about meeting up the demand of the courier company - could you clarify what that means?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Get back to me immediately you receive my email
body:
Attn: Mary

How are you today

I received your email and I want to let you know that your atm card is here
to receive from us and you have to send us your WhatsApp number and also
your home address and also know that you will pay for the delivery fees
which is the sum of 890$ to the the delivery company and also with the
insurance fees too because immediately you pay that they will move to your
home address with your atm card and you will be happy there immediately so
get back to me immediately
Thanks

Mr David Beardsley




null

subject: Re: Get back to me immediately you receive my email
body:
Hello Mr. David Beardsley,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm quite excited to hear about this ATM card! It's not every day that one receives such news.

Could you please provide me with more details? For instance, how did I come to be the recipient of this card? Also, could you explain a bit more about these delivery and insurance fees?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mary
